name: MineSweep
description: Become an expert in mine clearance! MineSweeper is a puzzle game whose goal is to locate hidden mines in a virtual field with the only indication of the number of mines in adjacent areas.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphique Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: All
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
